_header: Of Mary a maid without leasing
_description: James Ryman, A carol listing the events in the life of Christ — seven quatrains (aaab) including Latin refrain and/or burden: ‘Te deum laudamus’

CULAdd7350.First Lines:
Of mary a mayde withowt lesyngThis day was borne a worthy
                    kyngTherfor with Ioy now lett vs syngTe deum
                    laudamus…
CULAdd7350.Last Lines:
…That we may cume in to that placeTo syng with Ioy be fore his
                        faceTe deum laudamus
